import sqlite3
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

cnx = sqlite3.connect('/kaggle/input/clubhouse-dataset/Clubhouse_Dataset_v1.db')

df = pd.read_sql_query("SELECT * FROM user", cnx)
